title: What do people think of DistroKid for selling music? - Quora

response.answer_text: I recently released a CD and was going to go with TuneCore, which seems like a similar idea, but it was pointed out to me that if I went with CD Baby, I would also have efficient distribution of physical CDs, so I went with them.  They put your music on most digital-sales services and you have the option to distribute to Pandora and other streaming services as well.

But why share the revenue at all which would be fractional if you’re not among the most popular artists? Just set up your own website with a PayPal cart or Patreon donations. You’ll need the money to pay for the website’s running costs, haha. Physical CDs? Burn & send them out yourself. You’ll be able to connect with fans this way as I don’t think Apple gives you the customer’s details when you sell a track/album.
